availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Allen B. Gray (Bells, Ohio County, Kentucky, Tenant Farmer)

body.p: Bells, Ohio County, Kentucky, tenant farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Elizabeth Gray. Father of William Gray, Mary I Gray, John Gray, Walter Gray, Sarah Gray, James Gray, Elizabeth Gray, David Gray, Stephen Gray, Malinda Gray. Tennant farmer in Bells, Ohio County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ohio County, Bells, p. 569.
Find A Grave, "Allen B. Gray (January 10, 1817-October 20, 1873)," Memorial #70592537, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/70592537 (accessed January 09, 2019).
